info.name: Tweetdeck - Snowflake Classic Black
info.description: A very flat design inspired theme, make sure to set Tweetdeck to "dark" in the settings before installing this skin.
info.additionalInfo: Heavily modified version of Berter's Light Tweetdeck I made this theme using my very rusty and basic knowledge of CSS, which means that the code is horrible, modify it at your sanity's risk. There are still some things that don't really look good but I'm working on fixing them. I'd like to thank Calv (@calvcoll) for his help on this theme. Part of the Snowflake theme suite Seems to conflict a bit with Better Tweetdeck, might look a bit uglier if you use it.
